original_text: Paul went to the meeting place, as he usually did on a Jewish day of rest. On three rest days, he spoke God's message to the people there. He read from the Bible and he explained what it meant.
korean_text: 바울이 자기의 관례대로 그들에게로 들어가서 세 안식일에 성경을 가지고 강론하며

sentences.original_text: Paul went to the meeting place
on a Jewish day of rest
he spoke God's message to the people there
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 그곳 사람들에게 하나님의 메시지를 전했습니다

sentences.original_text: and he explained what it meant
